com.solarsystem.spaceobjects.orbiters

Class OrbitingSpaceObject

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.solarsystem.spaceobjects.SpaceObject
      • com.solarsystem.spaceobjects.orbiters.OrbitingSpaceObject
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Movable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Asteroid, Comet, Moon, Planet

    public abstract class OrbitingSpaceObject
extends SpaceObject
implements Movable
    This class models an orbiting space object. This class acts as the superclass for relevant moving space object child classes. Provides default orbiting funtionality for the solar object.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      OrbitingSpaceObject(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String colour, double diameter, Point location, SpaceObject objectOrbiting, double speed)
      Constructor used to make a reference to the object about which this object orbits.

      Method used to draw the space object and the object about which it orbits.

      Returns the space object that the object is orbiting.
      void move(SolarSystem system)
      Updates the current angle of the moving space object according to it's speed.

    • Constructor Detail

      • OrbitingSpaceObject

        public OrbitingSpaceObject(java.lang.String name,
                           java.lang.String colour,
                           double diameter,
                           Point location,
                           SpaceObject objectOrbiting,
                           double speed)
        Constructor used to make a reference to the object about which this object orbits. Calling the SpaceObject superclass constructor initialises member variables for the orbiting object.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the orbiting space object.
        colour - The colour of the orbiting space object.
        diameter - The diameter of the orbiting space object.
        location - A Point object consisting of a distance and an angle to model the orbiting space object's location.
        objectOrbiting - The space object about which the object orbits.
        speed - The speed of the orbiting space object.

    • Method Detail

      • draw

        public void draw(SolarSystem system)
        Method used to draw the space object and the object about which it orbits. This method simplifies the main method when drawing each space object in the loop.
        Specified by:
        draw in class SpaceObject
        Parameters:
        system - The solar system to draw objects in.

      • move

        public void move(SolarSystem system)
        Updates the current angle of the moving space object according to it's speed. Default behaviour for this method is creating a circular orbital path. Sub-classes can choose to override this method for a custom moving implementation.
        Specified by:
        move in interface Movable
        Parameters:
        system - The solar system to draw the object in.

      • getObjectOrbiting

        public SpaceObject getObjectOrbiting()
        Returns the space object that the object is orbiting.
        Returns:
        The orbiting space object instance.
